testcase.name: Register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given initialize register feature...........................................passed When user press register icon...............................................passed And user selects "male" and enters "attya" as first name, "mebed" as last name, "attyamebed@gmail.com" as email, "AttyaCO" as company, "Attya@mebed" as password and "Attya@mebed" as confirm password.passed And user set his birthday as follow "29" Day "7" Month "1994" Year..........passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then successful registration message appears................................passed

testcase.name: user didn't enter any data
testcase.system-out: Given initialize register feature...........................................passed When user press register icon...............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then error messages appear..................................................passed

testcase.name: user didn't enter the same password
testcase.failure:
Given initialize register feature...........................................passed When user press register icon...............................................passed And user selects "male" and enters "attya" as first name, "mebed" as last name, "attyamebed@gmail.com" as email, "AttyaCO" as company, "Attya@mebed" as password and "Atty@mebed" as confirm password.passed And user set his birthday as follow "29" Day "7" Month "1994" Year..........passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then user get non identical passwords.......................................failed

testcase.name: email already exist
testcase.system-out: Given initialize register feature...........................................passed When user press register icon...............................................passed And user selects "male" and enters "attya" as first name, "mebed" as last name, "attyamebed@gmail.com" as email, "AttyaCO" as company, "Attya@mebed" as password and "Attya@mebed" as confirm password.passed And user set his birthday as follow "29" Day "7" Month "1994" Year..........passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then email exist message appears............................................passed

testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When enter email "attyamebed@gmail.com" and password "Attya@mebed"..........passed And user press login........................................................passed Then user go to home page...................................................passed

testcase.name: Enter invalid email form

testcase.name: user forget Password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user press forget password.............................................passed And user enter email "attyamebed@gmail.com".................................passed And user press recover button...............................................passed Then user gets instructions message has been sent...........................passed
